actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-428.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 329 - 72 (Record Vote No: 2).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 389) making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, for the Department of Agriculture, and the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 391) making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the Department of Labor for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.J.Res. 389 (Department of Agriculture supplemental appropriation) and H.J.Res. 391 (Department of Labor supplemental apropriation).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 389) making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982, for the Department of Agriculture, and the joint resolution (H.J. Res. 391) making an urgent supplemental appropriation for the Department of Labor for the fiscal year ending September 30, 1982.
